languages.text: "Твой доспех держится на крючьях, которые вогнаны прямо в тело?"
"Your armour is held on with hooks that dig into your body?"
languages.original_text: "Твой доспех держится на крючьях, которые вогнаны прямо в тело?"

traits.locale_text: "Your armour is held on with hooks that dig into your body?"
"Your armour is held on with hooks that dig into your body?"
"Your armour is held on with hooks that dig into your body?"
"Your armour is held on with hooks that dig into your body?"

languages.text: “你的盔甲是用钩子直接钩进肉里的吗？”
languages.original_text: "Your armour is held on with hooks that dig into your body?"

traits.locale_text: “你的盔甲是用钩子直接钩进肉里的吗？”

languages.text: 「体にフックを食い込ませることで防具を留めているのか？」
languages.original_text: "Your armour is held on with hooks that dig into your body?"

traits.locale_text: 「体にフックを食い込ませることで防具を留めているのか？」

languages.text: «¿Tu armadura va sujeta con ganchos que se clavan en tu carne?».
languages.original_text: "Your armour is held on with hooks that dig into your body?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Tu armadura va sujeta con ganchos que se clavan en tu carne?».

languages.text: « Votre armure est maintenue en place par des crochets plantés dans vos chairs ? »
languages.original_text: "Your armour is held on with hooks that dig into your body?"

traits.locale_text: « Votre armure est maintenue en place par des crochets plantés dans vos chairs ? »

languages.text: "Eure Rüstung wird von Haken festgehalten, die in Eurem Körper stecken?"
languages.original_text: "Your armour is held on with hooks that dig into your body?"

traits.locale_text: "Eure Rüstung wird von Haken festgehalten, die in Eurem Körper stecken?"

languages.original_text: "Your armour is held on with hooks that dig into your body?"
